extension.summary: TheMovieDb Helper - Now With Trakt Support!
extension.description: TheMovieDb Helper provides details about movies, tvshows and actors from TMDb. Users can access a variety of lists from TMDb and Trakt.

extension.description: A repository for alpha releases of jurialmunkey's skins.

extension.summary: Kodi repository for beta/test versions of Marcelveldt's addons
extension.description: Kodi repository for beta/test versions of Marcelveldt's addons, for stable versions please just use the official Kodi repository. This repo is for test/beta versions of my work only

extension.description: I'm Rector, I do stuff, I put it here.
Movie Genre Icons for Horizon skin

extension.news: 1.1 - Added widget label setting[CR]1.0 - Initial release

extension.description: Arctic Horizon is a minimalistic skin with an emphasis on simplicity.

extension.summary: Clair, minimaliste, élégant, simple et léger.
extension.description: Arctic Zephyr 2 is a minimalistic skin created by jurialmunkey. The skin is designed to be simple so that the user can focus on their media content. In addition to the default light colour scheme, the skin also includes a number of darker variations.
